steps.name: user is on greencart landpage
user searched with "Tom" and extract actual name of product
Add number of "5" want to add
click on AddToCart button
click on Cart image and click on proceed to checkout
Validate number of kilograms we are added
click on place Order
choose country and terms of condition button
Click on Proceed Button
user is on greencart landpage
user searched with "Cuc" and extract actual name of product
Add number of "7" want to add
click on AddToCart button
click on Cart image and click on proceed to checkout
Validate number of kilograms we are added
click on place Order
choose country and terms of condition button
Click on Proceed Button
